languages.text: Ассасинами, специалистами по нанесению смертоносных ударов и {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} от вражеских атак, могут стать воины и оперативники. Ассасины имеют ключевой уникальный параметр {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}летальность{/g}, который может меняться в течение боя. Базовое значение равно наивысшему из двух параметров ассасина в текущем контексте — {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g}.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warriors{/g} and Operatives can become Assassins, killers who excel in delivering devastating blows and dodging enemy attacks. Assassins have a unique parameter called {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g}, whose value can change over the course of combat. Its base value is equal to either the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} (whichever is greater).
languages.original_text:
Ассасинами, специалистами по нанесению смертоносных ударов и уклонению от вражеских атак, могут стать воины и адепты.
Ассасины имеют ключевой уникальный параметр {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}<b>летальность<b>{/g}, который может меняться в течение боя. Базовое значение равно наивысшему из двух параметров ассасина в текущем контексте — {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Fighters and Adepts can become Assassins, killers who excel in delivering devastating blows and dodging enemy attacks.
Assassins have a unique attribute called <b>lethality<b>, whose value can change over the course of combat and is equal to either the Assassin's dodge or their dodge reduction (whichever is greater).

Fighters and Adepts can become Assassins, killers who excel in delivering devastating blows and dodging enemy attacks.
Assassins have a unique attribute called <b>lethality<b>, whose value can change over the course of combat and is equal to either the Assassin's dodge or their dodge reduction (whichever is greater).

Fighters and Adepts can become Assassins, killers who excel in delivering devastating blows and dodging enemy attacks.
Assassins have a unique attribute called <b>lethality<b>, whose value can change over the course of combat. Its base value is equal to either the Assassin's dodge or their dodge reduction (whichever is greater).

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warriors{/g} and Operatives can become Assassins, killers who excel in delivering {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} blows and dodging enemy attacks. Assassins have a unique parameter called {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g}, whose value can change over the course of combat. Its base value is equal to either the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} (whichever is greater).

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warriors{/g} and Operatives can become Assassins, killers who excel in delivering {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} blows and dodging enemy attacks. Assassins have a unique parameter called {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g}, whose value can change over the course of combat. Its base value is equal to either the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} (whichever is greater).

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Krieger{/g} und Agenten können zu Assassinen werden – Mörder, die im Ausführen von {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}verheerenden{/g} Schlägen und im Ausweichen feindlicher Angriffe glänzen. Assassinen verfügen über einen einzigartigen Parameter namens {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Letalität{/g}, dessen Wert sich im Verlauf des Kampfes ändern kann. Der Basiswert entspricht entweder dem {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} des Assassinen oder seiner {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g} (je nachdem, was höher ist).
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warriors{/g} and Operatives can become Assassins, killers who excel in delivering {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} blows and dodging enemy attacks. Assassins have a unique parameter called {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g}, whose value can change over the course of combat. Its base value is equal to either the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} (whichever is greater).

traits.locale_text: Kämpfer und Adepten können zu Assassinen werden — Mörder, die im Ausführen von {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}verheerenden{/g} Schlägen und im Ausweichen feindlicher Angriffe glänzen. Assassinen verfügen über ein einzigartiges Merkmal namens {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Lethalität{/g}, dessen Wert sich im Verlauf des Kampfes ändern kann. Der Basiswert entspricht entweder dem {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} des Assassinen oder seiner {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g} (je nachdem, was höher ist).

languages.text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerriers{/g} et les agents peuvent devenir des assassins, des tueurs qui excellent dans l'art de porter des coups dévastateurs et d'esquiver les attaques ennemies. Les assassins disposent d'un paramètre unique appelé {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Létalité{/g}, dont la valeur peut évoluer au fil du combat. Sa valeur de base est égale à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} ou à la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} de l'assassin (selon la valeur la plus élevée).
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warriors{/g} and Operatives can become Assassins, killers who excel in delivering devastating blows and dodging enemy attacks. Assassins have a unique parameter called {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g}, whose value can change over the course of combat. Its base value is equal to either the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} (whichever is greater).

traits.locale_text: Les Combattants et les Adeptes peuvent devenir Assassins, des tueurs qui excellent dans l'art de porter des coups {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}dévastateurs{/g} et d'esquiver les attaques ennemies. Les Assassins disposent d'un attribut unique appelé {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Létalité{/g}, dont la valeur peut évoluer au fil du combat. Sa valeur de base est égale à l'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} ou à la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} de l'Assassin (selon la valeur la plus élevée).

Les {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Combattants{/g} et les Adeptes peuvent devenir Assassins, des tueurs qui excellent dans l'art de porter des coups {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}dévastateurs{/g} et d'esquiver les attaques ennemies. Les Assassins disposent d'un paramètre unique appelé {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Létalité{/g}, dont la valeur peut évoluer au fil du combat. Sa valeur de base est égale à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} ou à la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} de l'Assassin (selon la valeur la plus élevée).

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}和特工可以晋级为刺客。刺客是杀戮方面的大师，擅长闪避敌人的攻击，对敌人造成致命伤害。 刺客拥有独特的属性，叫做{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致命{/g}，此属性值会随着战斗进展而发生改变。刺客的基础致命等同于刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}，以较高者为准。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warriors{/g} and Operatives can become Assassins, killers who excel in delivering {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} blows and dodging enemy attacks. Assassins have a unique parameter called {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g}, whose value can change over the course of combat. Its base value is equal to either the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} (whichever is greater).

traits.locale_text: 战士和专家可以晋级为刺客。刺客是杀戮方面的大师，擅长闪避敌人的攻击，对敌人造成致命伤害。{g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}{/g} 刺客拥有独特的属性，叫做{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致命{/g}，此属性值会随着战斗进展而发生改变。刺客的基础致命等同于刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}，以较高者为准。

languages.text: Los {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerreros{/g} y los agentes pueden convertirse en asesinos, expertos en asestar golpes devastadores y esquivar ataques enemigos. Los asesinos tienen un atributo único llamado {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}letalidad{/g}, cuyo valor puede cambiar con el curso del combate. Su valor base equivale a la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} del asesino o a su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} (se usa el valor superior).
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warriors{/g} and Operatives can become Assassins, killers who excel in delivering devastating blows and dodging enemy attacks. Assassins have a unique parameter called {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g}, whose value can change over the course of combat. Its base value is equal to either the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} (whichever is greater).

traits.locale_text: Los guerreros y los adeptos pueden convertirse en asesinos, expertos en asestar golpes {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastadores{/g} y esquivar ataques enemigos. Los asesinos tienen un atributo único llamado {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}letalidad{/g}, cuyo valor puede cambiar con el curso del combate. Su valor base equivale a la {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} del asesino o a su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} (dependiendo de cuál tenga un valor superior).

languages.original_text:
Assassins, specialists in delivering deadly blows and dodging enemy attacks, can be warriors and adepts.
Assassins have a key unique parameter <b>lethality<b>, which is variable and equal to the highest of the two assassin parameters in the current context, evasion or evasion reduction.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}とオペレーターはアサシンになることが可能であり、壊滅的な一撃を与え敵の攻撃を回避することに優れたキラーとなる。 アサシンには{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致死率{/g}という固有のパラメーターがあり、この値は戦闘中に変化する。その基礎値はアサシンの{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}（いずれか数値が高い方）と同等である。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warriors{/g} and Operatives can become Assassins, killers who excel in delivering {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} blows and dodging enemy attacks. Assassins have a unique parameter called {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g}, whose value can change over the course of combat. Its base value is equal to either the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} (whichever is greater).

traits.locale_text: ファイターとアデプトはアサシンになることが可能であり、{g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}壊滅的{/g}な一撃を与え敵の攻撃を回避することに優れたキラーとなる。 アサシンには{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致死率{/g}という固有のパラメーターがあり、この値は戦闘中に変化する。その基礎値はアサシンの{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}ドッジ{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}ドッジ減少{/g}（いずれか数値が高い方）と同等となる。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Kılıç Dansçısı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Ajan{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Savaşçılar{/g}, yıkıcı darbeler indirmekte ve düşman saldırılarından kaçınmakta ustalaşan bir katil olan Suikastçı'ya dönüşebilirler.
Suikastçılar {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}öldürücülük{/g} adı verilen eşsiz bir parametreye sahiptir. Bu parametrenin değeri çatışma boyunca değişebilir. Taban değeri, Suikastçı'nın {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}kaçınma azaltımı{/g} değerine eşittir (hangisi yüksekse).
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancers{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operatives{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warriors{/g} can become Assassins, killers who excel in delivering devastating blows and dodging enemy attacks. Assassins have a unique parameter called {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g}, whose value can change over the course of combat. Its base value is equal to either the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} (whichever is greater).

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Kılıç Dansçısı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Ajan{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Savaşçılar{/g}, yıkıcı darbeler indirmekte ve düşman saldırılarından kaçınmakta ustalaşan bir katil olan Suikastçı'ya dönüşebilirler.
Suikastçılar {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}öldürücülük{/g} adı verilen eşsiz bir parametreye sahiptir. Bu parametrenin değeri çatışma boyunca değişebilir. Taban değeri, Suikastçı'nın {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}kaçınma azaltımı{/g} değerine eşittir (hangisi yüksekse).
